page.title: 19LIFEBOATS
page.content: TODAY MRS CROOK THE LOCAL{CHAIRWOMAN CAME TO MOORSIDE FIRST SCHOOL TO TELL US ABOUT LIFEBOATS.THE FIRST{LIFEBOAT INVENTED WAS BY THE{R.N.L.I}WE SAW A VIDEO TAPE OF A MAN WHO SLIPPED OVER BOARD AND HOW THE LIFEBOAT SETS OUT TO SEA. WE SAW THE HELICOPTER COME DOWN TO TAKE THE PERSON TO SHORE.BEFORE WE SAW THE FILM WE WERE TOLD ABOUT{GRACE {DARLING}AND HOW SHE SAVED 9 PEOPLE IN THE SEA .THE OLD LIFEBOAT CALLED THE MARY JOICEY COULD ONLY GO 8 KNOTS BUT THE NEW BOAT CAN GO 33 KNOTS AND CAN HOLD 22 PEOPLE ON IT.THERE ARE 16 CREW MEMBERS IN NEWBIGGIN.TO TRAVEL 20 MILES IT TAKES 10 MINS BECAUSE IT GOES SO FAST.TO KEEP ALL THE LIFEBOATS GOING IT TAKES Â£20,000,000 PER YEAR.THE LIFE BOAT MEN KEEP A RADIO IN THEIR HOUSES IN CASE ANY EMERGENCIES OCCURS AT NIGHT.
